content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Ms. Abbasi. I understand that price is an important factor for you. Would you be willing to pay €750 per month for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Ms. Abbasi. If you change your mind or have any other questions, please let me know. Good luck with your search.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mister Schmidt. If the price were to drop, I would be interested in revisiting the negotiation. Could we agree on a price that is more in line with the market rate for similar apartments in the area?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Ms. Abbasi. I'm willing to negotiate. How about €650 per month? I think that's a fair price considering the location and the amenities nearby. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [650] Euro! Thank you for your time and effort in negotiating with me. I look forward to signing the lease soon.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent news, Ms. Abbasi! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The €650 per month is a fair price for both parties. I look forward to having you as a tenant and to a smooth leasing process. Is there anything else we need to discuss or agree upon before we proceed?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mister Schmidt, I believe we have covered everything. I'm ready to sign the lease once the terms are set. Thank you again for your time and for offering me a fair price. I'm looking forward to a positive landlord-tenant relationship. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
